landing.hero.title: Wisdom Through
landing.hero.tagline: For strategy, research, and decision teams who need defensible answers instead of single-model guesses.
landing.hero.description: Harness the collective intelligence of multiple AI agents debating your questions. Get balanced, well-reasoned answers through structured deliberation and expert judgment.
landing.who.title: Who is Consultaion for?
landing.who.persona1.title: Strategy & Leadership
landing.who.persona1.description: Turn messy decisions into structured, scored debates across multiple AI models.
landing.who.persona2.title: Research & Policy
landing.who.persona2.description: Stress-test assumptions with competing arguments and transparent judging.
landing.who.persona3.title: Product Committees
landing.who.persona3.description: Prioritize features by forcing models to argue from your constraints and metrics.
landing.who.persona4.title: Technical Leads
landing.who.persona4.description: Compare model behavior with real debate traces, not just single answers.
landing.features.title: What you can do with Consultaion
landing.features.multi.title: Run multi-model debates
landing.features.multi.description: Ask a question once, let multiple models argue in rounds, get a scored champion answer.
landing.features.templates.title: Use ready-made templates
landing.features.templates.description: Start from templates for strategy, product, and policy questions.
landing.features.traces.title: Review debate traces
landing.features.traces.description: Inspect every argument, judge decision, and final synthesis to build trust in the answer.

methodology.title: Methodology
methodology.executiveSummary.title: Executive Summary
methodology.executiveSummary.subtitle: Why Multi-Agent Debates Deliver Better Decisions
methodology.executiveSummary.benefit1: 360° Risk Analysis — Multiple AI perspectives identify blind spots a single model misses
methodology.executiveSummary.benefit2: Unbiased Decision Support — Structured debate format reduces confirmation bias
methodology.executiveSummary.benefit3: Defensible Outcomes — Full audit trail with transparent scoring for compliance
methodology.description: Consultaion combines per-judge pairwise ballots, Elo-style updates, and Wilson confidence intervals to keep the leaderboard statistically honest.
methodology.section.pairwise.title: Pairwise votes
methodology.section.pairwise.body: Each judge compares every persona head-to-head. Ties are dropped. We log the winner, loser, judge, optional category, and timestamp in pairwise_vote.
methodology.section.elo.title: Elo + Bradley–Terry
methodology.section.elo.body: Ratings start at 1500. We apply Elo updates with K=32 for the first 15 matches, then K=24. This mirrors the Bradley–Terry logistic model and stays stable for live updates.
methodology.section.wilson.title: Wilson confidence interval
methodology.section.wilson.body: Win rate is shown with a 95% Wilson interval. New personas get a NEW badge until they reach 15 matches.
methodology.section.cadence.title: Update cadence
methodology.section.cadence.body: Ratings update immediately after each debate. Admins can force recomputes via POST /ratings/update/<debate_id>.
methodology.section.antigaming.title: Anti-gaming
methodology.section.antigaming.body: Runs inherit the creator’s scope. Public leaderboard rows ignore private debates unless shared. Abusive streaks can be zeroed by clearing pairwise rows for that debate.
methodology.section.brand.title: Enterprise Features
methodology.section.brand.body: Consultaion provides enterprise-grade multi-agent deliberation with transparent scoring, full audit trails, and API access.

landing.socialProof.label: Trusted by teams worldwide
landing.socialProof.title: Decisions backed by multi-agent intelligence
landing.socialProof.subtitle: Organizations use Consultaion to get defensible answers on complex questions
landing.socialProof.testimonials.1.quote: We needed to evaluate AI rollout risks across compliance, security, and ROI. The chamber gave us every angle in one place.
landing.socialProof.testimonials.1.name: Sarah K.
landing.socialProof.testimonials.2.quote: For regulatory frameworks, we can't afford single-model bias. The debate format shows us conflicting viewpoints we'd otherwise miss.
landing.socialProof.testimonials.2.name: James M.
landing.socialProof.testimonials.3.quote: Consultaion turned feature prioritization from gut feel into structured deliberation. Our roadmap decisions are now data-backed.
landing.socialProof.testimonials.3.name: Alex R.
